about_the_game:
Gameplay Overview:

Just simply control the character to collect gold coins, and you can easily unlock the next level.

Game Highlights:

  • The game includes 25 trial levels.

  • One-click play: super easy to operate, easy to get started, don't worry about the levels being too difficult and giving you a headache.

  • No worries about getting stuck: stuck for five minutes? Don't worry, the skip button is thoughtfully available.

  • Super refreshing graphics: the game interface is simple and beautiful, and it's comfortable for your eyes to play.

  • Day and night changes, themes at your fingertips: like day or night? Choose for yourself, and have a fresh feeling every day.

As a solo developer, there are bound to be some oversights or areas that aren't completely satisfying. If you encounter any issues, please feel free to give me suggestions at any time; let's work together to make the game even better! Thank you for every player's participation!
detailed_description:
Gameplay Overview:

Just simply control the character to collect gold coins, and you can easily unlock the next level.

Game Highlights:

  • The game includes 25 trial levels.

  • One-click play: super easy to operate, easy to get started, don't worry about the levels being too difficult and giving you a headache.

  • No worries about getting stuck: stuck for five minutes? Don't worry, the skip button is thoughtfully available.

  • Super refreshing graphics: the game interface is simple and beautiful, and it's comfortable for your eyes to play.

  • Day and night changes, themes at your fingertips: like day or night? Choose for yourself, and have a fresh feeling every day.

As a solo developer, there are bound to be some oversights or areas that aren't completely satisfying. If you encounter any issues, please feel free to give me suggestions at any time; let's work together to make the game even better! Thank you for every player's participation!
name: One Pass Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760/ Radeon R9 280
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: "One Pass": A Stress-Reliever,a New Leisure Favorite!Control adorable little characters,collect gold coins, and navigate through fantasy levels.But don't underestimate the challenges, as each level hides the author's "little pranks" full of traps and humorous moments.Are you ready? Let's get started
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*, Japanese*, Polish*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Dutch*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
